sense.gloss: to leave (in someone's keeping), to put (in someone's care), to place (in someone's custody), to entrust (someone) with, to deposit
to put (someone) in charge of, to leave (a matter) in someone's hands, to let (someone) decide
to lean on, to put one's weight on

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓に|↑預↑↓あづ↓ける|のが↑嫌↑↓きら↓いな↑人↑↓ひと↓もいる。
sdata.e: Some people do not like to deposit their money in banks.

sdata.j: ↑荷物↑↓にもつ↓を|↑預↑↓あづ↓ける|ことができますか。
この↑荷物↑↓にもつ↓を|↑預↑↓あづ↓ける|↑事↑↓こと↓が↑出来↑↓でき↓ますか。
フロントに|↑預↑↓あづ↓ける|といいよ。
sdata.e: You had better check them at the front desk.

sdata.j: この↑案件↑↓あんけん↓をどう↑処理↑↓しょり↓するか、↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑下駄↑↓げた↓を|↑預↑↓あず↓ける|よ。
sdata.e: I'm just going to leave it up to him to figure out how to clean up this mess.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓だったら、そんなお↑金↑↓かね↓は↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓に|↑預↑↓あづ↓ける|よ。
sdata.e: If I were you, I'd put the money in a bank.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓にそのような↑大金↑↓たいきん↓を|↑預↑↓あづ↓ける|な。
sdata.e: Don't trust him with such a large sum of money.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑手荷物↑↓てにもつ↓はどこに|↑預↑↓あず↓ける|のですか。
sdata.e: Where can I check my luggage in?
